movie.title: The Two Popes
movie.plot: Frustrated with the direction of the church, Cardinal Bergoglio requests permission to retire in 2012 from Pope Benedict. Instead, facing scandal and self-doubt, the introspective Pope Benedict summons his harshest critic and future successor to Rome to reveal a secret that would shake the foundations of the Catholic Church.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 50 nominations.

events.title: the two popes watch the FIFA World Cup Final together
